usage.cn: 有时候，转身离开要好过假装若无其事的坚持。
usage.eng: Sometimes, walking away is better than standing there, acting like it doesn't bother you.

usage.cn: 学的越多,知道的越多, 知道的越多；忘记的越多, 忘记的越多；知道的越少, 为什么学来着?!
usage.eng: The more you learn, the more you know, The more you know, the more you forget. The more you forget, the less you know. So why bother to learn.
